snippet: Paul McGowan, a linebacker at Florida State in the 1980s, is the only past winner of the Butkus Award to have never played a down in the N.F.L.
abstract: Former Florida State linebacker Paul McGowan is only past winner of the Butkus Award to have never played a down in the NFL; former coaches and players say fact that he did not go on to next level is merely testament to how much he accomplished for his size and stature while in the collegiate ranks.
lead_paragraph: Paul McGowan, a linebacker at Florida State in the 1980s, is the only past winner of the Butkus Award to have never played a down in the N.F.L.

headline.seo: Among Butkus Winners, Paul McGowan Stands Out
headline.main: Award Said He Was Best; N.F.L. Was Silent
headline.print_headline: Best in College; Unwelcome In the N.F.L.
